mapper.sql: f.MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID, f.FNum, f.FPriorityID, f.DemandTime, f.FCustomer, f.RunningState, f.Transferor, f.TransferTime, f.TransferType, f.FCreator, f.PreparationTime, f.AuditMark, f.FReviewer, f.AuditTime, f.TransitionType, f.FExplanation

MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID, FNum, FPriorityID, DemandTime, FCustomer, RunningState, Transferor, TransferTime, TransferType, FCreator, PreparationTime, AuditMark, FReviewer, AuditTime, TransitionType, FExplanation
mapper.update:
update
set FNum = #{FNum}, FPriorityID = #{FPriorityID}, DemandTime = #{DemandTime}, FCustomer = #{FCustomer}, RunningState = #{RunningState}, Transferor = #{Transferor}, TransferTime = #{TransferTime}, TransferType = #{TransferType}, FCreator = #{FCreator}, PreparationTime = #{PreparationTime}, AuditMark = #{AuditMark}, FReviewer = #{FReviewer}, AuditTime = #{AuditTime}, TransitionType = #{TransitionType}, FExplanation = #{FExplanation} where MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID = #{MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID}

update
set FReviewer = #{FReviewer}, AuditMark = #{AuditMark}, AuditTime = #{AuditTime} where MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID = #{MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID}
mapper.select: select s.name FCreatePerson,s1.name TransferorPerson,s2.name FReviewerPerson, c.FName Customer_Name, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreator=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s1 ON f.Transferor=s1.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s2 ON f.FReviewer=s2.staff_id LEFT JOIN KM_Customer c ON c.Customer_ID=f.FCustomer where f.MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID = #{MaterialTransferApplicationForm_ID}
